name: Serrating
desc: A serrating weapon's bladed edge separates into jagged, swirling shards that spin along the blade. When dealing slashing damage, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 damage.
usage: etched onto a slashing melee weapon

activities.desc: You brandish the weapon and focus its power, causing the serrated shards to buzz as they spin at a dizzying speed. On your next hit with the weapon this turn that deals slashing damage, the serrating rune adds an additional |dice=1d12 S| 1d12 damage instead of the additional 1d4 damage, and then the shards return to their usual speed.
activities.name: Serrating Rune
